situation.name: Car Chase

situation.name: Gambling
situation.description: The mafia is running several casinos and the populace is partaking.
situation.immediate: Add 1 point to Mafia Presence and 2 points to Police Corruption

situation.musclemod: 1 1.5 Whoever Deals with this Situation gains 4 Moxie. No Negative Outcome

situation.name: Violence
situation.description: Mob violence is escalating across the land
situation.ongoing: Reduce a random player's Muscle by 1
situation.musclemod: 2 1 No Positive Outcome No Negative Outcome

situation.musclemod: 1.5 -0.5 Whoever Deals with this Situation gains 3 Moxie Whoever Fails this Situation immediately loses 5 stat points at random (minimum 0 in any Pool)

situation.name: Unlawful Gains
situation.description: There's a serious fraud problem in the city.

situation.name: Liquor Trade

situation.name: Jack Rabbit

situation.description: Vital evidence has been misplaced... or taken.
